info.name: nuSCP Beta
info.description:
nuSCP is a re-theming of the SCP-Wiki with improved and modern design standards. This theme was built by authors and fans for authors and fans and we hope to keep improving it every day!

You must be using a browser that supports FlexBoxes and CSS Variables for themes theme to work.
info.additionalInfo:
[2019 Wikidot Theme]
Designed by djkaktus, Woedenaz & Croquembouche
Built by Woedenaz, Croquembouche & rounderhouse for some reason
A WiP new theme for the SCP Wiki utilizing more current CSS styling standards.

See a preview overwriting old SCP theme here: http://scp-wiki.net/scp-4444

See a preview without the old SCP theme here: http://scptestwiki.wikidot.com/component:theme
